description: This file implements a chat UI page in Flutter, displaying messages and providing input functionality using provider for state management.

classes.name: ChatPage
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget that displays a chat interface, allowing users to view messages and send new ones.

classes.name: _ChatPageState
classes.description: State class for ChatPage managing message input and display Logic.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the chat interface, including message list and input field.

methods.name: _send
methods.description: Handles sending a message: reads input text, creates message object, updates provider, and clears input.
